description_for_human: Plugin for making lists and submitting and generating amd getting stories for hybridtales.com.
description_for_model: Plugin for managing a TODO list, you can add, remove and view your TODOs. This plugin also manages a STORIES list, you can add, remove, generate, and view your STORIESs. You can also view other usernames STORIES and ask for a list of all users STORIES.
